p: We add the explanation of the factors driving biennial patterns to the introduction and methods to explain why we calibrate vaccine effectiveness and rate of loss immunity to capture biennial patterns. Edits to text (lines 83 – 85): “In general, biennial patterns of RVGE could be induced by factors that govern the rate of new susceptibles. These include incomplete vaccine coverage, imperfect vaccine efficacy, and birth rate (Pitzer 2009; Pitzer 2011, Shah 2018).
